Code int to string (version python)

def decodemsg(M):
    return M.to_bytes((M.bit_length() + 7) // 8, "little").decode("utf-8")

def encode_msg(m):
    m.encode('utf-8')
    tmp = bytes(m, 'utf-8')
    str = int.from_bytes(tmp, "little")
    return str
